AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage.text: Maybe I went a little too far...

AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage.text: Ah, fuck that. Fire's really going for broke, though.

AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage.text: Bloody engine isn't cooling down, is it. Guess it wasn't made to work outside Avernus. Hope it holds together long enough to find an infernal mechanic.

AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage.speaker: Karlach
AvatarKarlachAfterEnrage.text: And a stiff drink, while I'm at it.

DesireDoor.speaker: Counsellor Florrick
DesireDoor.text: I'm trapped! Someone, open this door!

DesireDoor.speaker: Player
DesireDoor.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player strikes door with their fist, hoping to open it.

DesireDoor.speaker: Narrator
DesireDoor.text: *The door gives way with a loud crack.*
DesireDoor.context: CinematicNodeContext: The door gives way and lets out a crack

DesireDoor.speaker: Counsellor Florrick
DesireDoor.text: Let's move. Quickly - before the whole place collapses!

Dead.speaker: Narrator
Dead.context: NodeContext: describing a corpse after casting a speak with dead spell on it

AD.speaker: Fist Recruit Ephren
AD.text: Great Guard Helm, allow us peace in this plane and beyond.

AD.speaker: Fist Recruit Ephren
AD.text: Teach us care when we would be reckless. Teach us certainty when we would have doubt.

AD.speaker: Fist Recruit Ephren
AD.text: So it is spoken, and so is it done.

002_PostEA.speaker: Trynn
002_PostEA.text: If you want to go poking around in the cellar, be my guest. Plug your nose first though.
002_PostEA.context: NodeContext: Turning her attention from a trapdoor to the player. With a smirk on the last sentence

002_PostEA.speaker: Player
002_PostEA.text: This is a nice place to hole up in. What is it?

002_PostEA.speaker: Trynn
002_PostEA.text: It was a tollhouse. By the time we arrived, it was more like a slaughterhouse.
002_PostEA.context: NodeContext: with a shrug - explaining a reality of the world

002_PostEA.speaker: Trynn
002_PostEA.text: There's more monsters than coin moving down this road.

001_PostEA.speaker: Anders
001_PostEA.text: Our scouts told us you'd come. The devil's ally. Come to finish us, have you?

001_PostEA.speaker: Player
001_PostEA.text: You must mean Karlach. I know the truth about who you are.

001_PostEA.speaker: Anders
001_PostEA.text: I'm sure she's invented a fascinating history of our crimes. The truth is far simpler.

001_PostEA.speaker: Anders
001_PostEA.text: We are paladins of Tyr, Lord of Justice. He sent us after an infernal being, straight out of the Nine Hells, hiding in the form of a one-horned tiefling - Karlach.

001_PostEA.speaker: Anders
001_PostEA.text: She's slaughtered countless refugees fleeing the Absolute. Yesterday, she butchered an entire family. We were lucky to survive our encounter with her.

001_PostEA.speaker: Anders
001_PostEA.text: First I was burned within in inch of my life, and now I'm stuck playing pantomime. I can't take it anymore.
001_PostEA.context: NodeContext: the mask drops; he reveals his true nature. not a suffering paladin but an agent of evil

001_PostEA.speaker: Anders
001_PostEA.text: Karlach is going back to Avernus, and if she won't go quietly, she dies. It looks like I'll have to kill you first, which I quite look forward to. Bye-bye.

SpokeWithDeadCrime.context: NodeContext: shouting to alert companions in nearby rooms
NodeContext: quieter than previous lines - a threat to the player right before attacking

Dead_PostEA.speaker: Narrator
Dead_PostEA.context: NodeContext: describing a corpse that the player just cast a speak with dead spell on

Dead_PostEA.speaker: Refugee
Dead_PostEA.text: ... infernal... servant... so long I've forgotten... why...

PAD.speaker: Player
PAD.text: Scratches that size... something powerful made these.

PAD.speaker: Player
PAD.text: I think they're dragon marks. Better keep an eye out.

PAD_RefugeesAreCultists.speaker: Player
PAD_RefugeesAreCultists.text: Are we really going to hunt a devil on their behalf?

PAD_RefugeesAreCultists.speaker: Player
PAD_RefugeesAreCultists.text: The truth is, if there is a devil running wild, we might have to deal with it one way or another.

PAD_FoundKey.speaker: Player
PAD_FoundKey.text: A key. Wonder what it opens?

PAD_GnollsDead.speaker: Player
PAD_GnollsDead.text: Whatever killed those gnolls might be nearby. Careful.

AD_Refugees.speaker: Anders
AD_Refugees.text: Cut it out. There's worse than gnolls out there.
AD_Refugees.context: NodeContext: admonishing a companion, but in a friendly way

AD_Refugees.speaker: Trynn
AD_Refugees.text: Nothing we need to worry about.

AD_Refugees.speaker: Anders
AD_Refugees.text: How about a dragon? Would that worry you?
AD_Refugees.context: NodeContext: trying to get a rise out of a companion

AD_Refugees.speaker: Trynn
AD_Refugees.text: I'd give it a bloody good fight, that's for sure.

AD_Refugees.speaker: Anders
AD_Refugees.text: Ha! Only thing you'd give a dragon is bad gas.

PAD_CorpseSmell.speaker: Player
PAD_CorpseSmell.text: Ugh, that stench. Body must have been here a good while.
PAD_CorpseSmell.context: NodeContext: just entered a cellar where a decomposing corpse is creating a horrible stench - disgusted

AD_RefugeeAlarm.context: NodeContext: Calling for help to companions nearby

PAD.speaker: Player
PAD.text: The chest's clearly worth a lot to the Zhentarim, if it's returned unopened.

PAD.speaker: Player
PAD.text: It's our chest now. We can do whatever we want with it.

PAD.speaker: Player
PAD.text: These bones are ancient. I wonder who they were.

PAD.speaker: Player
PAD.text: There are Harper and druid symbols on their equipment - an interesting pair.

AD_FoundDeadDesire.speaker: Fist Recruit Aelis, Fist Recruit Ito, Fist Recruit Pavel, Gauntlet Yeva
AD_FoundDeadDesire.text: Florrick... we had better send her body home.

PAD_ToldOfZhentDungeon.speaker: Player
PAD_ToldOfZhentDungeon.text: They do seem a bit short-handed.

AD_FlamingFist1ComeIn.speaker: Counsellor Florrick
AD_FlamingFist1ComeIn.context: NodeContext: She's yelling from inside a burning building.

AD_FlamingFist1ComeIn.speaker: Gauntlet Yeva
AD_FlamingFist1ComeIn.text: We hear you! Stay where you are!
AD_FlamingFist1ComeIn.context: NodeContext: To Desire, elsewhere in the building.

AD_FlamingFist1ComeIn.speaker: Gauntlet Yeva
AD_FlamingFist1ComeIn.text: We don't have much time. Find her!
AD_FlamingFist1ComeIn.context: NodeContext: Barking orders to her fellow Flaming Fists.

Healthy_01.speaker: Hyena
Healthy_01.text: Go away. Or you will become new flesh.

Healthy_01.speaker: Hyena
Healthy_01.text: I will make you new flesh.

Healthy_01.speaker: Hyena
Healthy_01.text: Feed the beast. Feed the Butcher.

Healthy_01.speaker: Hyena
Healthy_01.text: Your flesh will grow inside us. Better flesh, thinking flesh.

DeathEvent.speaker: Narrator
DeathEvent.text: *The beautiful broken heap smells oddly enticing. You find you can't resist inhaling her offals.*
DeathEvent.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hyena is trying to drag herself to the player, but cannot due to the weight in her stomach.

DeathEvent.speaker: Narrator
DeathEvent.text: *You hear what comes next before you see it: the sharp snapping of bones and a yelp of pain as her body starts to twist and undulate.*

DeathEvent.speaker: Narrator
DeathEvent.text: *You watch with cold realisation - this isn't the end of one life, but the start of another...*

DeathEvent.speaker: Narrator
DeathEvent.text: *...Gnolls - vicious, monstrous humanoids - can spawn from the corpses of dying hyenas.*

DeathEvent.speaker: Player
DeathEvent.text: Show mercy, ending her life swiftly.

VB_PostFight_2P.speaker: Player
VB_PostFight_2P.context: NodeContext: After a fight, you're reflecting on the monsters you've killed.

VB_PostFight_2P.speaker: Player
VB_PostFight_2P.text: We'll have to keep an eye out for more.

PAD_HyenaRunning.speaker: Player
PAD_HyenaRunning.text: Watch it - that hyena's going for help!

Dead.speaker: Narrator
Dead.context: NodeContext: after casting speak with dead on a corpse that fell from a platform above

Dead.speaker: Dead Toll Collector
Dead.context: NodeContext: a speaking corpse telling us its name and job
